name: TimesTableMadness
0:
”Alexa, open Times Table Madness”
”Thirty five bananas”
”Alexa, ask Times Table Madness to test me on five”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: times table madness
des:
Times Table Madness offers a fun and exciting new way for kids to practice their times tables. 

Instead of just asking you the usual times table questions, Alexa will ask you to multiply silly objects. For example, she may ask you “What is ten times eight pineapples,” or "What is seven times twelve smelly socks." To score a point you would need to answer with “Eighty pineapples,” or "Eighty four smelly socks."

Alexa is quite generous in her scoring. So if you get the answer right, but say the wrong silly object, she'll probably let you off! 

You can ask Alexa to test you on any number, so it's fun for older kids and adults too. Why not try the 256 times table. 

Once you have chosen your times table, by saying e.g. "Test me on seven," Alexa will ask you 6 questions. After answering all the questions, she gives you a final score and tells you how long it took you to answer all the questions. 

See if you can beat your friends and family by scoring full marks in the fastest time. 

But most importantly... have fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
